DOC.brief_summary: to survey oral mucositis after chemotherapy and Concurrent chemoradiotherapy in Korean cancer patients
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study of Anti-Cancer Therapy Induced Oral Mucositis in Korean Cancer Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnosed with one cancer among head and neck cancer, esophageal cancer, breast cancer, colorectal cancer, gastric cancer, and nonsmall cell lung cancer, who are being treated or going to be treated as one between A and B A. Chemotherapy only B. Concurrent chemoradiotherapy Patients who are pregnant or breast feeding, absent from effective(medically proven) contraceptive method for females of childbearing potential Patients with performance status of ECOG score is more than 3
